PhonebookFaculty Staff Students As PDF University Directory Search People Overview Name Search by name Title Search by title Location Search by location Apply Reset Michel Cukier Affiliate Professor Email: mcukierumd[.dot.]edu Phone: (301) 314-2804 Location: AVW 3419 Website: http://terpconnect.umd.edu/~mcukier/ Google Scholar: b4zPppsAAAAJ Education: Ph.D., National Polytechnic Institute of Toulouse (France), 1996 Appointments: CS, ECE Research Areas: Cybersecurity and Cryptography Interest Areas: security evaluation, intrusion tolerance, distributed system validation, fault injection, software testing Mentions 2013 Maryland Cybersecurity Center Hosts "Cool Careers in Cyber Security for Girls Workshop" with National CyberWatch Center and Lockheed Martin
